---
title: "Chicken and Stuffing Casserole"
date: "2023-12-18"
categories: [sjoberg,chicken]
---

## Ingredients

-   4-6 cooked chicken breasts

-   0.5-1.0 lbs sliced mushrooms

-   26oz. can of cream of chicken soup

-   1 pint sour cream

-   2 boxes Stove Top

## Directions

1.  Preheat oven to 325F
2.  Mix all ingredients except Stove Top in a 9x13 pan.
3.  Prepare Stove Top with instructions on box.
4.  Place prepared Stove Top on mixture in 9x13 pan.
5.  Bake on top rack for 30 minutes.
